snippet.title: Swift: Firebase 3 - How to Send Videos (Ep 20)
snippet.description:
Hello everyone.  Let's start implementing the ability to send video files as a chat message in our application. Because this is a really cool feature, it also involves a couple of steps to get it working properly.  In this video, I'll first show you how to properly send our videos to Firebase Storage.  When this is done, we'll look at how to grab the first frame of the video and use this to render the chat bubble.  Hope you guys find this helpful and we'll get into how to actually play our video file in the next video. Enjoy

Previous Episode 19:
https://youtu.be/fo3nSRBWfRA

All episodes for Firebase 3 series:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JEfHqwjBV0XFb9qx9cGXwkq

Completed Source Code
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/playlist/Firebase-3-Chat-App/video/How-to-Send-Videos

Want to learn more about iOS Development? Here are a few additional playlist resources on my channel:

Lets Build YouTube series:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JGKdVUtA5xds1zcyzsz7HLj

Lets Build Facebook Feed series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JHDWIO3x4wePhD8G4d1Fa6N

Lets Build Facebook Messenger series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JHGoEg41IJNk9QQ_hPWcyRo
